lines: Mufutuli wangu nguJesu Mwami, Mufutuli waluyando,
Usisa buumi bwangu muli nguwe, Ukuli kukomanisya.
Usisa buumi bwangu muli nguwe, Muli ku komana lyonse,
Ulandisisa mu luyando lwakwe, Undivumba Ôjanza lyakwe,
Mufutuli wangu ngu Jesu Mwami, Utola mukuli wangu,
Nsikazwi muli nguwe undiyumya, Ulandipa nguzu lyonse.
Ulandi leleka mazuba onse, Akundizuzya bulemu,
Mububi bwangu ndamulumba Leza, Kunditumina Muvuni.
Ndamana mulimo ndilakutolwa, Ku muswana mumakumbi,
Lufutuko lupati a luyando, Ndiya kuimba kujulu.
